Post your riddles and try to answer others!

I\'ll start: This is an unusual paragraph. I\'m curious how quickly you can find out what is so unusual about it? It looks so plain you would think nothing was wrong with it! In fact, nothing is wrong with it! It is unusual though. Study it, and think about it, but you still may not find anything odd. But if you work at it a bit, you might find out! Try to do so without any coaching!

I think I\'ve got it:

The letter e is nowhere to be found in that paragraph

A bus driver was heading down a street in Colorado. He went right past a stop sign without stopping, he turned left where there was a 'no left turn' sign, and he went the wrong way on a one-way street. Then he went on the left side of the road past a cop car. Still - he didn\'t break any traffic laws. Why not?
